entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character in the story, mentioned as having seen Percy at meal-times.

entities.name: percy weasley
entities.description: Percy is mentioned as being busy and not himself, his exam results are also mentioned.

entities.name: fred weasley
entities.description: Fred is mentioned as frowning and wishing he knew what Percy was up to.

entities.name: george weasley
entities.description: George is mentioned as explaining the meaning of O.W.L.s and worrying about having another Head Boy in the family.

entities.name: bill weasley
entities.description: Bill is mentioned as being the oldest Weasley brother and working for Gringotts.

entities.name: charlie weasley
entities.description: Charlie is mentioned as studying dragons in Romania.

entities.name: ginny weasley
entities.description: Ginny is mentioned as needing robes and a wand for school.

entities.name: lockhart books
entities.description: Lockhart's books are mentioned as being expensive.

relationships.description: Harry has seen Percy at meal-times.
Fred is concerned about what Percy is up to.
George mentions that Bill got the same number of O.W.L.s as him.
George is worried about affording Ginny's school expenses.
